Book Your Room Now!!Simple Introduction of GreeceGreece, officially the Hellenic Republic, is a country in Southeast Europe. According to the 2011 census, Greece's population is around 11 million. Athens is the nation's capital and largest city, its urban area also including Piraeus. The names for the nation of Greece and the Greek people differ from the names used in other languages and cultures.TOP Tourist Attractions / Point of Interest of Greece1. Acropolis of Athens2. Parthenon3. Meteora4. Ionian Islands5. Knossos6. Colossus of Rhodes7. Hellenic Parliament8. Corinth Canal9. The Mall Athens10. Statue of Zeus at Olympia11. Dikti12. Areopagus13. Erechtheion14. Attica Zoological Park15. Benaki Museum16. National Archaeological Museum, Athens17. Acheron18. Samaria Gorge19. Spinalonga20. Acropolis Museum21. Temple of Zeus, Olympia
